body:
Hi, I just had the same issue, follow below a possible workflow.

```
.
.
 def _model_fn(features, labels, mode, params, config):
    graph = create_your_graph_here(features, labels)
    tf.contrib.framework.init_from_checkpoint("./checkpoint_path", {"scope/":"my_scope/"})
    .....
```

Cheers
